description: Nurse Joy`s Latias was sent out to battle against Forest`s Rhyperior to see if Forest was worthy to be the Gym Leader of the Pewter City Gym. Brock and his family were all a bit shocked when it was revealed that a Legendary Pok√©mon was going to battle. Nurse Joy`s Latias was able to withstand countless attacks from Forest`s Rhyperior and ended up winning the battle.
name: Latias (Joy)
